conclusion: Trace imagined straight-line bounces off slanted plates to determine stream paths.
Stream A hits the upper black plate.
Stream A deflects down/right after hitting the upper black plate.
Stream A hits the lower white plate.
Stream A deflects down/left after hitting the lower white plate.
Stream A falls into the left-hand pocket leading to container E.
Stream B misses the black plate and first contacts the lower white plate.
Stream B deflects down/right after hitting the lower white plate.
Stream B falls directly into the first red pocket leading to container F.
Stream C immediately strikes the yellow plate.
Stream C deflects down/right after hitting the yellow plate.
Stream C hits the grey plate.
Stream C deflects down/left after hitting the grey plate.
Stream C drops into the second red pocket leading to container G.
Stream D clears all plates until striking the grey plate.
Stream D deflects down/left after hitting the grey plate.
Stream D continues into the right-hand white pocket beyond G.
None of E, F, G receives Stream D.
Final assignment: A → E, B → F, C → G, D → none of E/F/G.
